title: Ticket #4689: disable classad dirty tracking in all compat_classad ctors
description: When we turned off classad dirty tracking in the constructors for compat_classad, we missed on, that is used by condor_history and a few other tools. These tools don't use dirty attribute tracking, but this slows down classad construction and increases memory usage. We should disable it everyone it isn't needed.
